user_reviews.description: Booked car from ola app on 24/08/2022 from yeshwantpur to kempegowda international airport once reached at location i paid 1073 rs through phonepe to driver personal number it was early morning so the network services was not up to mark automatically it shown processing so i requested to driver that it's showing processing so it will credit to ur account  r else mine so i will resend once i reach my place and i literally requested him a Lott but the hell driver was so rude , unprofessional and just mentally abusived  me and again i paid from my frnd and he asked extra 130 for late payment so even i paid 1200 to him for same number it got credited to him and after two days my remaining amount 1073 got credited to the driver but he refused to send me  from last month I'm  calling the ola customer support team and Asking to refund the amount but seriously they are playing a game with me like today tommrow another week like so this is the just worst service u r giving to customer just fed-up of your drama so please kindly response to this review and refund my money back
user_reviews.name: Shanvi Sanu

user_reviews.name: Nandini Chandrakumar

user_reviews.description:
My first and last terrible experience with Ola.

The app doesn't detect my right location, or the drive didn't bother coming at pick up. I walked over to the other side, give him the otp. Right upto that point the destination address was displayed properly. After typing in the OTP the drop point displayed was my pick up point.
There's the glitch, the driver requested I check. I did. My details show correctly as I booked them. It didn't show the same on his device, and he tells me I've entered the wrong details, that he'll drop me to my pick up point from where I walked to catch my ride in the first place.
He tells me it's my mistake and that I'm not the only one who knows to use technology.
He spoke much too much than was necessary.
He called his supervisor and spoke of my rash talk, NOBODY wants to hear a whole doze of yelling first thing the morning!

When the supervisor requested to speak with me, when I explained the situation, she had the decency to apologise for the problem.
But it wasn't over!
This man! After a whole lot of drama he drove the auto while talking on the phone constantly complaining about me to his (pretend) supervisor. And when I did ask him to stop talking, he refused. Asked him to give me the phone so I can speak as well, he refused.
He went out of line and said " I should listen to him complain during the ride ". He continued talking on the phone while driving which is violation101.
You guys are no competition to Uber. I am certainly NOT the first of customers complaining about ola drivers or their terrible services!
user_reviews.name: Shreya Ciryam

user_reviews.description:
I had an issue during my share trip today where while booking the Ola app showed me that I will be sharing the trip with 2 other passengers & mine would be the 2nd drop. But when the 1st passenger drop was completed, the driver told me that mine would be the 3rd drop as his App interface showed the same even though my drop location was just 2km away from the Passenger-1 drop location & the Passenger-3 location was 6kms away. The driver gave me a helpless look as there is nothing that he could do. I de-boarded the cab as 6km to & fro in Bangalore would have delayed me by atleast 30-45mins. After de-boarding I contacted the customer care for 2 reasons - 1. To end my ongoing trip as the driver was unable to do that 2. Request a partial refund as I wasn't dropped at my desired destination.
I was first attended by Wilfred. The arrogant way he spoke made me feel that I have taken some favor from him for free. Realizing that I was not going to get any solution from Wilfred, I asked my call to be escalated. I was next connected to Deepa. Surprisingly, from the start of the conversation, she wasn't even ready to listen to my issue and kept on repeating "We understand your inconvenience, but there is nothing we can do". Moreover, the condescending way she spoke made me realize that OLA is far from being a customer centric company & with un-trained and un-empathic customer service reps like Wilfred & Deepa, the company would only go downwards.
user_reviews.name: Anand Krishnan

user_reviews.description: Third class company stealing money from innocent and old age people, drivers are #1 in cheating with route for money.
user_reviews.name: G K

user_reviews.description: Ola is full of fraudsters and scammers.
user_reviews.name: Surya Singh
